settings.question: How much is shipping?
settings.answer: Overnight Shipping on all orders over $100 is Free.Shipping on orders below $100 is $35

settings.question: Do you ship Internationally?
settings.answer: We only ship orders in the United States.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: All products are guaranteed to be fresh and should be inspected immediately upon arrival.  Please keep all packaging intact for returns. All claims must be made within twenty-four hours of receipt of shipment.Contact inna@besterusa.com  Once a claim is received and accepted by Bester Caviar, we will reship merchandise. Please keep all packaging intact for any returns.All returns must be shipped to:Bester Caviar1000 Brickell PlazaUnit 2812Miami, FL, 33131

settings.question: What payment method do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard and American Express.   You can also place your order over the phone by calling our toll-free number: +18135109892

settings.question: Will my order stay fresh during shipping?
settings.answer: All perishable items are stored at the lowest temperature without freezing it to ensure its freshness and highest quality. Our innovative packaging system keeps perishable  products fresh for 48 hours transit time. All perishable products are delivered in 24 hours packed in styrofoam coolers with frozen gel packs via UPS Overnight. You will receive a tracking number once the product is shipped. Your shipping is monitored by our team all the way to your doorstep! In case of hazardous weather conditions all packages are stored in a refrigerated facility at UPS hub, you can always contact our customer support with any questions regarding shipping.

settings.question: How long does caviar stay fresh?
settings.answer: Open tin stays fresh for 5 days.Closed tin stays fresh for 6-8 weeks refrigerated.

settings.question: How do I store caviar?
settings.answer: Put caviar in the lowest part of your refrigerator on the lowest settings 28-36F. We don’t advise freezing caviar. After freezing, caviar loses the right texture and flavor.

settings.question: How to open a caviar tin?
settings.answer: You can use a table-knife, spoon, a tin opener or even a coin. Any metal object with a thin end will do it. Insert it horizontally between the lip of the lid and the threading of the base and apply light pressure.

settings.question: How to serve caviar?
settings.answer: Traditionally caviar is served on toasted breads or with blinis (mini pancakes) and creme fraiche as well as chopped onions, crumbled hard-boiled eggs, caviar pairs well with champagne or vodka.

settings.question: Do you ship to P.O. Box?
settings.answer: We don’t ship to P.O. Boxes

settings.question: I live in Miami, is there same day delivery?
settings.answer: Yes, we provide same day complimentary hand delivery in Miami, for cities near Miami there is 50$ same day delivery fee.We always provide a photo proof of delivered product.

settings.question: Do you ship on weekends and national holidays?
settings.answer: We deliver packages Tuesday- Friday. We provide Saturday delivery if requested by a customer. Overnight shipping is closed on weekends and National Holidays : New Year’s Day, President’s Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, and Christmas.

settings.title: Free Overnight Delivery
settings.text: Free Overnight Shipping in temperature controlled coolers for perishable goods Monday through Thursday & Same Day Free Delivery in Miami 24/7.
